label: Logan, Alan, Jana Hoffmann & Carsten Lüter.  2015. Checklist of Recent thecideoid brachiopods from the Indian Ocean and Red Sea, with a description of a new species of Thecidellina from Europa Island and  a re-description of T. blochmanni Dall from Christmas Island. Zootaxa 4013(2): 225–234.
